Last Wednesday, I finally finished the immediate projects that I was 
doing for TGS.  That means I have more free time now.

**Shameless Plug**
The 1st story I did for TGS (well, I wrote most of the outline and did 
some bits of writing the story) is finally 
published - Solstice - 
http://tgs.gargoyles-fans.org/td/season4/solstice.htm

Hopefully, by the end of March 2003, one story that I wrote the entire 
outline for TGS will be published and another story that I wrote half 
the outline for TGS will be published.

I say hopefully because writing hasn't started on them because 
outlines for the season they are in haven't been completed yet.  Once 
all the outlines for that season are completed, writing on them will 
begin.

**End Shameless Plug**
